Mini-Updates and New E-Group


I've been spending a lot of time lately exploring more quests for your gaming enjoyment, but unfortunately that cuts into my time needed to maintain this site as regularly as I would like.

For the time being, most updates will consist of items on the Wishlist, a page detailing things I'm working on at the moment but have not yet completed, and encouraging fellow questing fans to explore these on their own. Enough details are provided on this page to help get you started on the quests, and I would love to hear if anyone is able to lend input on these interesting possibilities.

In addition, I have started a mailing list so that list members will be notified when new updates have been added (either on Wishlist or on the main site). Please email me in order to be added to this list. Thanks for your continued support, and good exploring to you all!





Page updated: 04/70/01
